title: Better memory management
body: Improving memory management would prevent IE from blowing through all available graphic memory. Often, when using a high number of tabs (common in development), IE will overload the available graphics memory (never RAM), and elements will start disappearing from web pages or failing to load altogether.

comments.body:

It doesn't seem right since other resource-intensive applications can work quite OK without saturating all resources. IE alone takes machine down.
